scripts.postinstall: cd back-static && npm install && cd ../front-static && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start-test-front: cd front-static && npm run build-test && npm run start-test
scripts.start-test-mobile: cd mobile-static && npm run build-test && npm run start-test
scripts.start-prod-front: cd front-static && npm run build-prod && npm run start-prod
scripts.start-prod-mobile: cd mobile-static && npm run build-prod && npm run start-prod
